body:
Comment 2 by **kq1quick**: 
Another testcase (not a composite literal, but a newline issue so probably related):

if S.x == 45
    {
		;
    }

Fails with:
s3.go:16: S.x == 45 not used

If the open { brace is moved up to the condition test line (following 45) then it 
works.

[Too much gofmt is not a good thing for parser test cases methinks.  :-)  ]
